description:
The MOD11C2.004 dataset was decommissioned as of October 19, 2017. Users are encouraged to use Version 6 of MODIS/Terra Land Surface Temperature and Emissivity Daily L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG.  

The MODIS/Terra V4 LST/E 8-Day L3 Global CMG product (Short name: MOD11C2) is an 8-day composited average, derived from the MOD11C1 daily global product, and stored as clear-sky LST values during an 8-day period in a 0.05º (5600 meters) geographic CMG. MOD11C2, therefore, inherits all the structural features of its MOD11C1 parent except for the temporal configuration. Please refer to the MOD11C1 product documentation for all algorithm-related details.

The V4 MOD11C2 product comprises the following Science Data Set (SDS) layers for daytime and nighttime observations: LSTs, quality control assessments, observation times, view zenith angles, clear sky coverages, and emissivities for bands 20, 22, 23, 29, 31, and 32.

The V4 Terra/MODIS LST/E products, including MOD11C2, are validated to Stage-1 with well-defined uncertainties over a range of representative conditions. Further details regarding MODIS land product validation for the LST/E products is available from the following URL: http://landval.gsfc.nasa.gov/ProductStatus.php?ProductID=MOD11

This product is ready for use in science applications/publications. Subsequent and improved versions of this product also exist.

The V4 MOD11C2 product has an acquisition range from February 26, 2000 until December 31, 2006 (2006-365). The V4 collection remains consistent with V41, and users may combine the two collections in a time-series analysis.

V004 Data Set Characteristics: 
Dimensions: 3600 x 7200 rows/columns 
File Size: ~470 MB 
Resolution: 0.05-degrees (5600-meters at the equator) 
Projection: Lat/Lon 
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS HDF Layers): 15
title: MODIS/Terra Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity 8-Day L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG V004
